sqlMap.statement: SELECT ABS.MDL_NM , ABS.MTR_LB_CD , ROUND(AVG(ABS.AVG_MTR_READ_CNT), #avgMtrReadCntScl#) AS AVG_MTR_READ_CNT FROM SVC_ADCV_BY_SER ABS WHERE ABS.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND ABS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' GROUP BY ABS.MDL_NM , ABS.MTR_LB_CD

SELECT ABS.MDL_NM , ABS.MTR_LB_CD , ROUND(AVG(ABS.AVG_MTR_READ_CNT), #avgMtrReadCntScl#) AS AVG_MTR_READ_CNT FROM FLD_ADCV_BY_SER ABS WHERE ABS.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND ABS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' GROUP BY ABS.MDL_NM , ABS.MTR_LB_CD
